description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Wedding's Basic Bessemer Process. Translated [from the supplement to the author's Darstellung des schmiedbaren Eisens” entitled, “Basische Bessemer oder Thomas Process”] ... by W. B. Phillips ... and E. Prochaska ... With a supplementary chapter on dephosphorization in the basic open-hearth furnace, by E. Prochaska" Author: WEDDING, Hermann. Contributor: PHILLIPS, William Battle. Contributor: PROCHASKA, Ernst. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 7107.d.2.", "British Library DSC W71/7909" Page: 100 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1891 Publisher: Scientific Publishing Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003874923 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
